aboutMarito.intro: Igama 'Mafoko' livela ku-Xitsonga, lithethela 'amagama' namkha 'amagama'. Leli yiaplikheshini yewebhu ehamba phambili edibanisa isikhala esiphakathi komfuyo wabuciko bolimi baseNingizimu Afrika nokufinyelela kwamanje kwedijithali. Abancameli bolimi, abatjhejisisi be-NLP, kanye neengcali zeelimi zingasebenzisa i-Marito njengepulatfomo ehilanganisiweko ukurhubhulula, ukuthabatheka ingxenye, nokugcina amaglossary eelimi ezinengi, amadikshonari, namabhanki amagama eelimini ezili-11 ezisemthethweni zaseNingizimu Afrika.
aboutMarito.mission: I-Mafoko isebenza kahle kokubili ku-inthanethi nangemhlaba we-inthanethi, inikeza amandla imiphakathi ukufinyelela iinsetjenziswa zeelimi ezipelele, ukunikeza impendulo, nokusebenzisana ekwakheni ama-lexicons aqinako eelimini ezinayo iinsetjenziswa ezincinane. Lelipulatfomo liyingxenye yezinyatselo eziragelelako ezenziwa ngu-DSFSI (Data Science for Social Impact) eYunivesithi yasePretoria ukwenza iinsetjenziswa zeelimi zifikeleleke emiphakathini yonke nokurhagela phambili utjhejo lokusetjenziswa kolimi lwemvelo lweelimi zase-Afrika.

aboutMofoko.title: Ngemva kweMafoko
aboutMofoko.content: IMafoko (elitjho ‘amabizo’ ngesiTswana) liyipulatifomu yezilimi ezinengi elakhiwe bona ligubhe begodu lihlanganise iinlimi eziyi-11 ezisemthethweni zeSewula Afrika.

whyMafoko.title: Kubayini iMafoko ikhona
whyMafoko.content: Iinlimi zeSewula Afrika zihlaza, ziyakhuluma, begodu zihlobene khulu nobuntu bethu, kodwana inengi lazo alikabi nemininingwane ethe tjhaphulukileko ephasini ledijithali. IMafoko yakhiwe bona iguqule lokhu. Ihlanganisa amabizo nezincazelo ezivela kumaziko ahlukene wamagama, ukwenza indawo eyodwa lapho kungase kufunwe khona, okwenza kube lula ukufuna amagama, ukuqonda izihumusho, nokufunda ngezinye iinlimi ezisemthethweni eziyi-11.
whyMafoko.content2: Kungakhathaliseki bona use-inthanethini namkha awukho, iMafoko igcina ulwazi lwezilimi luseduze nawe. Iphinde ikhuthaze ukubambisana, ivumele imiphakathi bona inikele ngeziphakamiso, yabelane ngolwazi, bese isiza ekuphuculeni umgangatho walowo nalowo magama ngokuhamba kwesikhathi.
whyMafoko.content3: Ngokuhlanganisa imithombo yezilimi ehlukanisileko kube yipulatifomu ephilako, ekhula ngokuhamba kwesikhathi, iMafoko isiza ekulondvolozweni kwelifa lethu begodu isekela imfundo efaka woke umuntu kanye nocwaningo lwezilimi zemvelo lwezilimi ezinezinsiza ezincane.

whoMafoko.title: Yenzelwe bani
whoMafoko.content: Abafundi, ootitshere, abacwaningi, kanye nabantu abanesithakazelo ngezilimi namasiko.

howMafoko.title: Indlela yokusebenzisa iMafoko
howMafoko.content: Ungasebenzisa iMafoko ukufuna amagama, ukuhlola imikhakha yezilimi ehlukene, ukubona izihumusho, futhi wabelane ngemibono yakho ukusiza ekuthuthukiseni ipulatifomu.
howMafoko.help: Ukuze uthole imininingwane eningiliziwe equkethe iziqondiso ezimfishane namavidiyo wokufundisa, vakashela

behindProject.title: Ngemuva kwePhrojekthi
behindProject.content: IMafoko yakhiwe liqembu leData Science for Social Impact (DSFSI) eNyuvesi yasePitoli.

loginPage.subtitle: Sibawa ufake imininingwana yakho yokungena.
loginPage.errorTokenMissing: Ungene ngepumelelo, kodwana awukho umtlolo-mqondiso otholakileko. Sibawa uthintane ngesizo.
loginPage.errorDefault: Ukungena kuhlulekile. Sibawa uhlole imininingwana yakho.
loginPage.errorUnknownNetwork: Kwenzeke iphoso yenethiwekhi engakaziwa. Sibawa uzame godu.

registrationPage.alertSuccess: Ubhaliso luphumelele! Sibawa uragele phambili ungene.
registrationPage.errorUnknownNetwork: Kwenzeke iphoso yenethiwekhi engakaziwa. Sibawa uzame godu.

errors.fileTooLarge: Ubukhulu befayili kufanele bube ngaphansi kwe-5MB

termsAndConditions.title: Imigomo Nemibandela
termsAndConditions.welcome: Siyakwamukela ku Mafoko, ipulatifomu yeelimi ezinengi eyakhiwe njalo ephethwe liqembu leData Science for Social Impact (DSFSI) eNyuvesi yasePitoli. Ngokusebenzisa iMafoko, uyavuma nale Migomo leMibandela. Sicela ufunde ngokucophelela ungakasebenzisi noma ungakafaki isandla kule pulatifomu.
termsAndConditions.purpose: IMafoko (elitsho 'amazwi' ngesiTswana) yipulatifomu yemfundo engayona eyezohwebo ekhuthaza iilimi ezisemthethweni eziyi-11 zaseNingizimu Afrika ngokunikeza ukufinyelela kumagama amanengi kanye nezinsiza zeelimi. Le pulatifomu yakhelwe ukusekela ukufunda okuhlanganisayo, ucwaningo, kanye nokusebenzisana phakathi kwemiphakathi yeelimi.
termsAndConditions.user: Ukuze uhlanganyele kuMafoko, njengokuthumela amazwi, ukuvota, ukuphawula, noma ukufaka isicelo sokuba nguchwepheshe wolimi, abasebenzisi kufanele benze i-akhawunti. Uyavuma ukunikeza ulwazi olunembile nolunyanisekileyo lapho ubhalisa, futhi ugcine imininingwane yakho yokungena iyimfihlo. I-DSFSI inelungelo lokumisa noma ukususa ama-akhawunti aphula le Migomo noma athumela okuqukethwe okungafanele.
termsAndConditions.contribution: IMafoko ivumela abasebenzisi ukuthi bathumele amazwi, izichasiso, izincazelo, kanye nemibono. Ngokuthumela okuqukethwe, unikeza i-DSFSI ilayisensi engesiyo eyezohwebo, engenandleko yokubonisa, ukukhiqiza kabusha, nokusabalalisa igalelo lakho ngaphakathi kuMafoko ngenhloso yemfundo nocwaningo.
termsAndConditions.contribution2: Yonke iminikelo kufanele ibe efanele, ehloniphekile, futhi elungile ngokolimi. Okuqukethwe okucwasayo, okungahloniphi, noma okuyinkohliso kuzokususwa, futhi ukuphinda iphutha kungaholela ekumisweni kwe-akhawunti.
termsAndConditions.linguist: Abasebenzisi abafuna ukuba ngochwepheshe beelimi kule pulatifomu bangafaka izicelo ngokunikeza ubufakazi bokushicilelwa kwemisebenzi yabo (njengamarekhodi e-Google Scholar). I-DSFSI inelungelo lokuhlola nokufakazela ubuqiniso bezitifiketi ngaphambi kokunikeza izimvume zobuchwepheshe bolimi.
termsAndConditions.property: Ipulatifomu yeMafoko, ehlanganisa ukwakheka kwayo, isakhiwo, kanye nezichazamazwi eziqoqiwe, iyimpahla yengqondo ye-DSFSI kanye neNyuvesi yasePitoli. Amazwi nezinguquko ngamunye kusale kuyimpahla yababhali nabahlinzeki bawo, kodwa kungasetshenziswa futhi ngaphakathi kuMafoko ngenhloso yemfundo nocwaningo njengoba kuchaziwe ngenhla.
termsAndConditions.accuracy: Nakuba iMafoko ihlose ukunikeza ulwazi lweelimi olunembile noluthembekile, i-DSFSI ayiqinisekisi ngokuphelele ukunemba noma ukuphelela kolwazi. Le pulatifomu inikezwa 'njengoba injalo' ngenhloso yemfundo, futhi i-DSFSI ayinacala nganoma yimaphi amaphutha, ukushiywa, noma imiphumela evela ekusetshenzisweni kwayo.
termsAndConditions.commercial: IMafoko inikezwa mahhala ngenhloso yemfundo nocwaningo. Akuvunyelwe ukukopisha, ukusabalalisa, noma ukusebenzisa noma yiliphi okuqukethwe kule pulatifomu ngenhloso yokwenza inzuzo ngaphandle kwemvume ebhaliwe evela ku-DSFSI.
termsAndConditions.privacy: IMafoko ayisebenzisi ama-cookie, ukulandela imikhondo, noma izinsizakalo zokukhangisa. Ulwazi lwe-akhawunti lugcinwa kuphela ukuze kuvunyelwe ukubamba iqhaza kwabantu abasebenzisa kanye nokugcina ukusebenza kahle kwepulatifomu. I-DSFSI ayabelani ngedatha yomuntu siqu nabanye abantu noma izinhlangano zangaphandle.
termsAndConditions.change: I-DSFSI ingavuselela le Migomo Nemibandela ngezikhathi ezithile ukuze ibonise ukuthuthukiswa noma izinguquko zenqubomgomo. Ukuqhubeka nokusebenzisa iMafoko ngemva kokubuyekezwa kusho ukuthi uyavuma le Migomo ebuyekeziwe.
termsAndConditions.contact: Ngeziphakamiso noma ukukhathazeka okuhlobene nale Migomo Nemibandela, sicela uxhumane neqembu leData Science for Social Impact (DSFSI) eNyuvesi yasePitoli.

feedbackPage.description: Yabelana ngemibono yakho ukusisiza siphucule isevisi yethu.
feedbackPage.description2: Sazise ngento engahambanga kuhle ukuze sikwazi ukuyilungisa.
feedbackPage.description3: Sifuna ukuzwa ukuthi yini esiyenzayo kahle.
feedbackPage.name: Igama (Ngokuzithandela)
feedbackPage.compliment: Sazise ukuthi yini eyenze okuhlangenwe nakho kwakho kube kuhle

termAdditions.extContent: Khetha amagama aqinisekiswe ngabaphathi ukuze engezwe njengokuhumusha:
termAdditions.content2: Khetha amagama aqinisekiswe ngabaphathi ukuze engezwe njengokuhumusha:
termAdditions.deleteContent: Uqinisekile ukuthi ufuna ukususa lokhu kuthunyelwe? Lesi senzo asikwazi ukuguqulwa.

glossaryPage2.agriculture: Amagama achaza ezolimo, ukufuywa kwezifuyo kanye nezinqubo zokukhiqiza kwezolimo.
glossaryPage2.construction: Amagama asetshenziswa kwezokwakha, izinto zokwakha kanye nokuphathwa kwamaphrojekthi.
glossaryPage2.demography: Amagama achaza izici zabantu kanye nezibalo zomphakathi.
glossaryPage2.education: Amagama ahlobene nokufunda, ukuqeqesha kanye nezinhlelo zemfundo.
glossaryPage2.energy: Imibono ehlobene nokukhiqizwa kwamandla kanye nezinhlelo zokusebenzisa amandla.
glossaryPage2.environment: Amagama achaza ukuvikelwa kwemvelo, i-ecology kanye nokusimama kwemvelo.
glossaryPage2.generalDemography: Izibalo zabantu ezibanzi ezifaka ubudala, ubulili kanye nokufuduka kwabantu.
glossaryPage2.businessEnterprises: Imibono ehlobene nokuphathwa kwebhizinisi, osomabhizinisi kanye nemisebenzi yezinkampani.
glossaryPage2.geography: Amagama achaza indawo, izifunda kanye nokwenza amabalazwe.
glossaryPage2.healthVitalStats: Izincazelo namagama ahlobene nempilo, inhlalakahle kanye nezibalo ezibalulekile zezempilo.
glossaryPage2.householdIncome: Imibono ehlobene nebhajethi yasemakhaya, izindleko kanye nezinga lokuphila.
glossaryPage2.housingServices: Amagama achaza izindlu, ingqalasizinda kanye nezinsiza eziyisisekelo zasedolobheni.
glossaryPage2.incomeWealth: Amagama ezomnotho achaza ukusatshalaliswa kwemali engenayo, impesheni kanye nengcebo yasemakhaya.
glossaryPage2.industryTrade: Amagama achaza imboni, ukuthumela ngaphandle kanye nokuhweba kwemboni.
glossaryPage2.labour: Amagama ahlobene nezisebenzi, imiholo kanye nemakethe yezisebenzi.
glossaryPage2.lawJustice: Amagama achaza izinhlelo zomthetho, amalungelo kanye nezinhlelo zobulungiswa.
glossaryPage2.manufacturing: Imibono ehlobene nokukhiqiza kwezimboni, izinqubo zokukhiqiza kanye nezindlela zokuhlinzeka.
glossaryPage2.nationalAccounts: Izinkomba ezinkulu zomnotho ezifaka i-GDP, imali yezwe kanye nezibalo zezimali.
glossaryPage2.government: Amagama achaza izakhiwo zikahulumeni, ukuphathwa kanye nezikhungo zomphakathi.
glossaryPage2.populationCensus: Amagama ahlobene nokubalwa kwabantu kanye nokuhlaziywa kolwazi lwezibalo zabantu.
glossaryPage2.poverty: Imibono echaza ubumpofu, ukungalingani kanye nentuthuko yomphakathi.
glossaryPage2.prices: Amagama ezomnotho achaza intengo, amanani abathengi kanye namandla okuthenga.
glossaryPage2.privateSector: Amagama achaza amabhizinisi azimele, utshalomali kanye nemisebenzi yezinkampani.
glossaryPage2.publicFinance: Amagama achaza isabelomali sikahulumeni, intela kanye nokuphathwa kwezimali zomphakathi.
glossaryPage2.scienceTech: Imibono yesayensi kanye nobuchwepheshe ehlanganisa ucwaningo kanye nokuqamba okusha.
glossaryPage2.socialConditions: Amagama achaza inhlalakahle yomphakathi, izinsiza zomphakathi kanye nezimo zokuphila.
glossaryPage2.statisticalProcesses: Amagama ezobuchwepheshe achaza izinga lezibalo, metadata kanye nezindlela zokusebenza ngemininingwane.
glossaryPage2.businessRegisters: Imibono ehlobene nokugcina nokuvuselela izincwadi zebhizinisi zikazwelonke.
glossaryPage2.tourism: Amagama achaza ukuvakasha, imboni yezokuvakasha kanye nezibalo zezivakashi.
glossaryPage2.tourismMigration: Amagama achaza ukuhamba kwezivakashi, ukufuduka kanye nokuhamba kwabantu.
glossaryPage2.trade: Imibono ehlanganisa ukuhweba, ukuthumela ngaphandle nokuhwebelana kwamazwe.
glossaryPage2.transportCommunication: Amagama achaza ezokuthutha, ingqalasizinda kanye nezinhlelo zokuxhumana.
glossaryPage2.loginError: Ngena ngemvume ukuze ubeke uphawu ezichazamazwini.

weeklyGoals.Maintain a login streak of 2 consecutive: Gcina uchungechunge lokungena ngemvume kwezinsuku ezimbili ezilandelanayo

termHelpPage.title: Ukuqonda Incwadi Yamabizo
termHelpPage.intro: I-Incwadi Yamabizo yindawo lapho ungafuna khona izincazelo zamabizo ngezilimi eziningi phakathi kwezilimi eziyishumi nanye ezisemthethweni zaseNingizimu Afrika. Ivumela ukufuna ngokushesha, ukuhlunga ngolimi noma ngesigaba, futhi ingasetshenziswa ngaphandle kwe-inthanethi uma izichazamazwi sezilandiwe ngaphambilini.
termHelpPage.overviewBody: Incwadi Yamabizo ivumela ukuthi ufune izincazelo zamabizo ngezilimi ezahlukene phakathi kwezilimi ezisemthethweni eziyishumi nanye zaseNingizimu Afrika.
termHelpPage.whatIsATermBody: Ibizo ngalinye kuMarito liqukethe imininingwane elandelayo:

termFields.language: Ulimi: Olunye lwezilimi ezisemthethweni eziyishumi nanye zaseNingizimu Afrika.
termFields.related: Amabizo Ahambisanayo: Amagama ahlobene noma anezincazelo eziseduzane.

termHelpPage.languagesBody: UMarito usekela zonke izilimi eziyishumi nanye ezisemthethweni zaseNingizimu Afrika. Ungasebenzisa ukuhlunga ukuze ugxile kolunye ulimi noma ucwaninge phakathi kwazo zonke.
termHelpPage.searchBody1: Umsebenzi wokufuna kuMarito usiza ekutholeni amagama ngokushesha phakathi kwezilimi ezisemthethweni eziyishumi nanye zaseNingizimu Afrika.
termHelpPage.searchBody2: Ngesikhathi ubhala, uMarito usesha ngesikhathi sangempela, ubonise imiphumela ngokushesha.

searchFields.term: Ibizo: Igama noma isisho esimelela umqondo othile.
searchFields.definition: Incazelo: Amagama anezincazelo aqukethe amagama owawasesha nawo azovela.

termHelpPage.searchLiveBody: UMarito ungaphakamisa amagama ahlobene noma aphothuliwe ngesikhathi ubhala.
termHelpPage.searchSensitivityBody: Ngokuvamile, uMarito usesha ngokunembile noma ngokuseduze, kodwa ungase uvumele ukufuna okungeyona ngokunembile (fuzzy search).
termHelpPage.searchResultBody: Amabizo aboniswa kumakhadi aqukethe igama, ulimi, isigaba, incazelo, kanye nezinkinobho zokuvota.
termHelpPage.filtersBody: Ukuze unciphise imiphumela, sebenzisa izihlungi ezitholakala ekhasini lokufuna.

filtersList.language: Ulimi: Nciphisa imiphumela kulolunye ulimi kuphela.
filtersList.domain: Isigaba: Gxila ezifundweni ezifana neMfundo, Ezempilo, noma Ezobuchwepheshe.
filtersList.fuzzy: Ukufuna Okungeyona Ngokunembile: Thola amagama noma kube khona amaphutha okubhala noma ukuhluka kancane.

termHelpPage.viewBody: Chofoza inkinobho ethi 'Buka' kumakhadi egama ukuze uvule incazelo ephelele futhi ubone amagama ahlobene.
termHelpPage.offlineBody: UMarito ungasebenza ngaphandle kwe-inthanethi uma izichazamazwi sezilandiwe ngaphambilini.
termHelpPage.offlineEnd: Ngemva kokulanda, amagama kuleyo sichazamazwi azohlala etholakala ngisho noma ungekho ku-inthanethi.

workspaceHelpPage.title: Ukuqonda i-Workspace
workspaceHelpPage.intro: Workspace ivumela wena ukuthi ugcine amagama nezichazamazwi ozithandayo, uwahlukanise ngamaqembu, futhi uphathe lawo maqembu. Kule ndawo lapho ungakwazi khona ukulandela inqubekela phambili yezethulo zakho zamagama kanye nokugcina amanothi omsebenzi wakho.
workspaceHelpPage.groupsBody: Amaqembu asiza ukuhlela amagama agciniweyo. Ungenza amaqembu amasha, ushintshe amagama awo, noma ususe lawo ongawasadingi.
groupsSteps: Yenza Iqembu: Chofoza inkinobho ethi Iqembu Elisha, faka igama, khetha amagama, bese uqinisekisa ngokuchofoza Engeza Amagama.
Guqula Igama Leqembu: Chofoza isithonjana sepensela eduze kwegama leqembu, shintsha igama, bese uqinisekisa ngokuchofoza Guqula Igama.
Susa Iqembu: Chofoza isithonjana sokususa, khetha amaqembu ofuna ukuwasusa, bese uqinisekisa.
workspaceHelpPage.moveBody: Ukuhambisa igama kuqembu elihlukile, chofoza isithonjana sokuhambisa eduze kwegama bese ukhetha iqembu elisha.
workspaceHelpPage.notesBody: Amanothi akuvumela ukuthi ungeze imininingwane eyengeziwe kumagama agciniweyo. Ungakwazi ukwenza, ukuhlela, noma ukususa amanothi ngaphakathi ku-Workspace.
notesSteps: Engeza Inothi: Chofoza isithonjana senothi eduze kwegama, bhala inothi yakho, bese uchofoza Gcina.
Hlela Inothi: Chofoza isithonjana sepensela, shintsha umbhalo, bese uchofoza Gcina.
Susa Inothi: Sebenzisa inketho yokususa ukususa amanothi ongawasadingi.
workspaceHelpPage.deleteBody: Ungasusa izinto eziku-Workspace yakho noma kunini:
deleteSteps: Susa Igama: Iya ku-Amagama Agciniweyo, chofoza isithonjana sokususa, bese uqinisekisa.
Susa Isichazamazwi: Iya ku-Izichazamazwi Ezigciniweyo, chofoza inketho yokususa, bese uqinisekisa.

settingsHelpPage.title: Swisetelo na Ku Tiyisa
settingsHelpPage.intro: Tirhisa pheji ra Settings ku lulamisa leswi u swi rhandzaka — ku katsa mutshamo, vuxokoxoko bya phurofaele, ni ku fikelela — ku tumbuluxa ntokoto lowu nga wa wena.
settingsHelpPage.modesTitle: Ku Hundzula Pakati ka Light na Dark Mode
settingsHelpPage.modesBody: Mafoko yi ku pfumelela ku hundzula hi ku hatlisa exikarhi ka Light Mode na Dark Mode hi ku landza leswi u swi rhandzaka ni ndzhawu ya wena. Xivumbeko lexi xi kona eka matluka hinkwawo naswona xi pfuxeta xihundla lexi nga emahlweni ka wena hi ku hatlisa handle ko endla khombo eka ntirho wa wena.
modesSteps: Kuma Xihlawulekisi: Languta xifaniso xa dyambu/n’weti ehansi ka levohlo ra ximatsi.
Hundzula Mode: Clicka xifaniso ku hundzula hi ku hatlisa exikarhi ka Light na Dark Mode.
settingsHelpPage.profileBody: U nga pfuxeta vito, imeyili, kumbe phasiphwedi nkarhi wihi na wihi eka swisetelo swa phurofaele. Ku cinca ku kondza ku tiyisiwa hi ku sirhelela.
profileSteps: Pfuxeta Vito: Clicka Cinca Vito, nghenisa vito lerintshwa, tiyisisa hi phasiphwedi ya wena, kutani u clicka Hlayisa.
Pfuxeta Imeyili: Clicka Cinca Imeyili, nghenisa imeyili leyintshwa, tiyisisa hi phasiphwedi, kutani u clicka Hlayisa.
Pfuxeta Phasiphwedi: Clicka Cinca Phasiphwedi, nghenisa leyintshwa, tiyisisa, kutani u clicka Hlayisa.
settingsHelpPage.accessibilityBody: Mafoko yi nyika swihlawulekisi swo hambanahambana swa ku fikelela leswaku u kota ku lulamisa app hi ndlela leyi fambelanaka ni swilaveko swa wena. U nga cinca ririmi, vukulu bya marito, ndzhawu, ni pharologanyo ya mihlovo eka menyu ya settings.
accessibilitySteps: Cinca Ririmi ra App: Pfula menu ya ririmi kutani u hlawula ririmi leri u ri rhandzaka.
Vula High Contrast Mode: Clicka High Contrast toggle ku hundzula eka muhlovo wa pharologanyo ya le henhla.

leaningPathHelp.title: Ukuqonda Izindlela Zokufunda
leaningPathHelp.section1: Isici se-Learning Path sikuvumela ukuthi ulungise uhambo lokufunda olulawulwayo lokufundela olunye lwezilimi ezisemthethweni zaseNingizimu Afrika. Ngokukhetha ulimi kanye nezinsiza ofuna ukuzisebenzisa, ungakwazi ukulandela indlela ehlelekile esikhundleni sokuhlola ngokungahleliwe.
leaningPathHelp.section2: Indlela ngayinye yokufunda ihlanganisa amagama, amathuluzi okuzilolonga, kanye nokulandela intuthuko ukuze uhlale ukhuthazekile futhi ube nokuzimisela.
leaningPathHelp.section4: Ngemva kokuba ukhethe ulimi, uzocelwa ukukhetha i-glossary. I-glossary ngayinye ihlelwe ngokwesigaba (Imfundo, Ezempilo, Ubuchwepheshe) ukuze ugxile kumagama abalulekile kuwe.
leaningPathHelp.section5: Uma i-glossary yakho isilungisiwe, ungakhetha indlela ofuna ukufunda ngayo
leaningPathHelp.section7: Phendula imibuzo ukuze uhlolisise ulwazi lwakho futhi uqiniseke ngalokho okufundile.
leaningPathHelp.section9: Sebenzisa amakhadi okufunda ukuze wakhe ukuqonda nokukhumbula amagama ngesivinini sakho.
leaningPathHelp.section12: Learning Path ilandelela umsebenzi wakho ukuze ubone ukuthi usuhambe kangakanani. Inqubekela phambili ikhombiswa kanye nezibalo zomphakathi wakho, ukwenza kube lula ukuhlala ukhuthazekile.
leaningPathHelp.section13: Hlanganisa Izindlela Zokufunda nezinselelo zamasonto kanye nezindondo ukuze uthole amabheji njengoba uthuthukisa amakhono akho olimi.

helpPage2.section2: Isiqondiso ngesinyathelo ngesinyathelo sokudala i-akhawunti, ukungena, nokuzulazula kuqala esizeni.
helpPage2.section3Desc: Funda ukuthi ungathumela kanjani, uphawule, futhi usebenzisane nabanye usebenzisa amathuluzi omphakathi afana nokuvota nokuxoxa.
helpPage2.dictionaryDesc: Sesha amagama ezilimini ezahlukene, vula usesho olungacacile, futhi ulungise izilungiselelo zesichazamazwi sakho.
helpPage2.glossaryDesc: Hlela, hlunga, futhi uthumele ama-glossary ngokuya ngesigaba, indawo, noma ibhange lezinguqulo.
helpPage2.workspaceDesc: Gcina futhi uphathe amagama kanye nama-glossary akho, landela izethulo, futhi usebenzisane usebenzisa amanothi namaqembu.
helpPage2.settingsDesc: Lungisa izintandokazi ezifana nemodi emnyama/noma ekhanyayo, izinketho zokufinyelela, imininingwane yephrofayela, kanye nezinye izilungiselelo zomsebenzisi.
helpPage2.homeDesc: Hlola imephu esebenzisanayo yaseNingizimu Afrika, thola amagama ahlukahlukene, futhi uthole izihloko ezivelele.
helpPage2.dashboardDesc: Landela umsebenzi wesayithi ngamashadi, bheka idatha, futhi uhlaziye iminikelo yakho endaweni eyodwa.
helpPage2.learningPathDesc: Dizayina uhambo oluqondisiwe lokufunda olunye lwezilimi ezisemthethweni zaseNingizimu Afrika.
helpPage2.feedbackDesc: Thumela iziphakamiso, izincomo, noma izikhalo ngqo eqenjini ukusiza ukuthuthukisa isayithi.

workspace.section1: Awukho ku-inthanethi. Inothi lakho ligciniwe futhi lizahlanganiswa nawubuya ku-inthanethi.
workspace.section2: Kwehlulekile ukugcina amanothi. Sicela uzame futhi.
workspace.section3: Sicela ungene ngemvume ukuze ususe izibekisi.
workspace.section4: Kwehlulekile ukususa ithemu. Sicela uzame futhi.
workspace.section5: Sicela ungene ngemvume ukuze ususe amaqembu.
workspace.section7: Kwehlulekile ukususa amaqembu. Sicela uzame futhi.
workspace.section10: Lokhu kuzohambisa wonke amathemu kula maqembu ku-"Onke Amathemu" iqembu.
workspace.section13: Sicela ungene ngemvume ukuze wakhe amaqembu.
workspace.section26: Yakha iqembu elitsha ukuze uhlele amathemu agciniweyo.
workspace.section27: Khetha amathemu ofuna ukuwafaka eqenjini elisha.
workspace.section29: Awekho amathemu abekiwe. Bukmarka amathemu kuqala.
